prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a massive, imposing gray alien warrior, smooth yet highly textured gray skin, giant black void eyes, wearing red and black Pride Trooper combat suit
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, extreme muscle definition, visible veins, subtle wet sheen on the gray skin, detailed texture on the suit fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth gray skin, human skin color, doll, flat lighting, bad anatomy
